title: You Can Install PostgreSQL with conda?
description: Did you know it's possible to install and run PostgreSQL with conda? Find out how in the first post in the, "You can do that with conda?" series.

title: New community meetings schedule for 2026
description: Starting in 2026, conda and conda-forge will share the same time slots for their community calls.

title: Sharded repodata in conda (beta): an order of magnitude faster
description: Conda fetches repodata much more quickly. Learn how we did it and who helped along the way.

title: November 2025 Releases
description: conda 25.11.0, conda-build 25.11.0, and conda-libmamba-solver 25.11.0 have been released! 🎉

title: Practical Power: Reproducibility, Automation, and Layering with Conda
description: Part 3 of the 'Conda Is Not PyPI' series: how conda enables reproducibility, automation, layered workflows, and rolling distribution.
